page.title: 01SUTTON, SURREY.
page.content: The London Borough of Sutton is on the southern edge of Greater London with easy access to Central London and the South Coast. It is bordered by open countryside on its southern boundary. Mainly residential in character, with some light industry, the area is a popular choice for commuters. It has a wide range of residential properties and many parks and open spaces. Sutton itself has an excellent shopping centre with most of the major chain stores represented, plus a variety of smaller shops, restaurants and other services. Sutton's shoppng centre is now partly pedestrian. There are good shoppng areas in other parts of the district. There are also good facilities for sport and entertain_ ment including Westcroft Sports Centre, Carshalton and the Secombe Centre in Sutton.
